name: Lone Wolf: Fire on the Water
overview: You are Lone Wolf in this adaptation of Joe Dever's second gamebook, "Fire on the Water". In the previous game, all of your compatriots, the warrior-monks known as the Kai, have been massacred but you alone made it to the king to warn him of the coming armies. Now you have to make a long journey to a neighboring kingdom to secure help to stop the invasion. Like the previous adventure, the gameplay is based around gamebook-style choices, but with combat rendered in a 2d fighting mode. The game is an interactive novel with action RPG elements.
